name: Building System - Windows
description:
5/15 - Fixed snapping with angled foundations, and updated item descriptions.

5/14 - Added roof pieces to the building system.

5/13 - Updated the snapping system and added a door in the other tab.  Use [E] To open the door.

5/12 - Just released an update to the snapping system, rotation of pieces, and overall bug fixes and part updates.
